lines.text: Dark enchantress - - can you doubt me - - ?
Strange these men never notice their wives until I take a fancy to them.
Bardelys, you are much too clever - - how can I trust you?
Fair enchantress - - can you doubt me?
I had only disliked you before - - now I must despise you!
You know - women are like wine. When one disappoints - there is always a better!
You don't know women! The less one begs of them - the more one can take. I never beg!
I can win any woman I want for my wife - - but, Mon Dieu, I don't want a wife!
If they catch me, I'll lose my head - - and I have too good a head to lose.
I could almost believe I had been slain, Mademoiselle - - and this is Heaven - - and you are an angel.
You are beautiful - - kind - - and clever. I had never hoped to find so many virtues - - in one woman -...
I have never known a woman like you. I shall go - - but I shall not forget you - -
[Kiss]
To you, de Lesperon, I pledge my sword! Down with the King and the perfumed fops of the Court!
I'm all in a twitter - - that dreadful Bardelys is coming here!
Roxalanne, my beloved - unworthy wretch that I am - I have no right to your love -...
While I am away from you, my dear - you may have many reasons to doubt me -...
[Kiss]
But tell me again that you love me - it will give me courage - - whatever happens.
Can you not read your answer in my eyes?
I am ready,my friends! Life has been a magnificent adventure - Death may be another!
My master, Bardelys the Magnificent, will shortly honor your house - - Make ready the best rooms - - bring forth the rarest wines - - and tell the ladies he is coming!
Tell him I cannot live without him any longer - I shall surely die!
He will be delighted!
